description: This file defines a RecyclerView.Adapter implementation named NotesAdapter for displaying a list of Note objects in an Android app. It manages creating and binding view holders for note items, including handling click and long click events, and updating the list of notes displayed.

classes.name: NotesAdapter
classes.description: RecyclerView adapter for displaying a list of notes, handling view creation, data binding, and user interactions.

classes.name: Holder
classes.description: ViewHolder class for note item views, encapsulating references to UI components and binding data to views.

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Replaces the current list of notes with a new list and refreshes the view.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates a new ViewHolder by inflating the item_note_card layout.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds a Note object to a ViewHolder at the specified position.

methods.name: getItemCount
methods.description: Returns the total number of note items.

methods.name: bind
methods.description: Binds a Note object to the ViewHolder's views and sets click listeners.
